name: Party Never Dies!
description:
Entry to the Ludum Dare 46 Theme: Keep it alive Quick Start
Mouse input only - Select a DJ Plate.
- Choose a matching record.
- Use the Crossfader to make a Smooth Transition.

A LITTLE CONTEXT

This is your story. This is your night to shine.

You come from a long tradition of DJs! But this party is special…

You have a duty. You have to keep the party alive.

HOW TO PLAY

Mouse input only.

Interactive items:

  • Crossfader.
  • DJ Plates.

As a DJ you have to handle 3 things:

  • What record are you playing.
  • Which one will be the next one.
  • When to change between them.

Your audience tonight is pretty picky. You have to shuffle between 3 genres: the party people will love their color genre, they will be okay with antoher color but will HATE the other genre. Don’t worry, you always have your cheat sticker to help you.

Select the record you are going to play next by clicking on the plate. Then use the Crossfader to change between plates. The current plate will be discarde. You need to be careful because people don’t like when you take the song they like too early but they HATE when there’s no song playing! Make a smooth transition with the green needle trail.

If people keep loving the songs you are playing, they will be On Fire and they will be to immersed on the party to care about genres - just be sure to keep the groove!

Take all people to the On Fire state!! And keep the party alive.
